symptoms.name: Skin lesions
symptoms.pattern: Violaceous pink to purple plaques or macules, may ulcerate, may be painful with associated lymphedema and secondary infection; lesions may progress from patches to plaques to nodules

symptoms.name: Gastrointestinal symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Bloody stools, pain, diarrhea, or physical obstruction

symptoms.name: Respiratory symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Breathlessness due to blockage, coughing up blood

physical_findings: Violaceous pink to purple plaques or macules on skin or mucocutaneous surfaces
Lesions may be ulcerated or nodular
risk_factors: Eastern European or Mediterranean descent (classic KS)

required: Histopathological examination showing spindle cell proliferation with characteristic vascular channels
